{"type":"text","timestamp":1771657032577,"sessionID":"ses_3810342a7ffeKPmsfXWpCCWOC1","part":{"id":"prt_c7efcdeda001FzuEy41HHTXMUq","sessionID":"ses_3810342a7ffeKPmsfXWpCCWOC1","messageID":"msg_c7efcbd980014e6Z2tvDj5RzQx","type":"text","text":"```dockerfile
# Multi-stage build: separate build and production dependencies
FROM node:20-alpine AS builder

# Set working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy dependency files first for better caching
COPY package.json package-lock.json ./

# Install dependencies
RUN npm ci

# Copy application source code
COPY . .

# Build TypeScript application
RUN npm run build

# Production stage: create minimal runtime image
FROM node:20-alpine

# Create non-root user for security
RUN addgroup --system appgroup && \
    adduser --system --ingroup appgroup appuser

# Set working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy dependencies from builder stage
COPY --from=builder /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist

# Switch to non-root user
USER appuser

# Document the port the application listens on
EXPOSE 3000

# Health check endpoint
HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD curl -f http://localhost:3000/health || exit 1

# Label the image with metadata
LABEL maintainer="team@example.com" \
    org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/org/repo" \
    org.opencontainers.image.description="Node.js Express API service" \
    org.opencontainers.image.version="1.0.0"

# Run the application using exec form
CMD ["node", "dist/server.js"]
```","time":{"start":1771657032577,"end":1771657032577}}}
